short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snap Magic - Snap, Edit, Share: Your Social Media Screenshot Companion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple screenshot tool that lets you capture screenshots for social media.

With Dev mode, sharing your social media posts, revenue charts, or usage numbers has never been easier.

✒️ Features
- Screenshot visible area
- Screenshot selected area
- Dev mode (Allows you to screenshot a DIV or a IMG tag easily)
- Select and snap (Select a bigger area and navigate through elements within that area using = and - keyboard keys)
- Edit screenshot image with the following options
    - Add Background color
    - Add Padding, 
    - Add Inset etc
    - Add shadow
    - Add title to the image

✒️ Pro features
- Add brand name
- Add noise
- Choose inset colors (Colors are picked from the screenshot)
- Change size of the image
- Rotate image (Both on X & Y axis)

Buy the PRO version here for just 5$ -> https://dineshs.lemonsqueezy.com/buy/bdae6169-e25c-439e-b807-aca0ff49a87e
